briefTitle: Phase I Trial: 68Ga-NODAGA-E(c[RGDyK])2 Positron Emission Tomography for Imaging Angiogenesis in Primary and Metastatic Tumor Lesions in Humans
conditions: Neuroendocrine Carcinoma, Breast Cancer, Ovarian Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Diagnosed with neuroendocrine cancer, breast cancer or ovarian cancer
* Capable of understanding and giving full informed consent

Exclusion Criteria:

* Pregnancy
* Lactation
* Obesity (weight above 140 kg)
* Claustrophobia
